problem.markdown:
>>If the processing rate (production rate while the machine is up) is \(\mu=2\) parts per minute, what is the long-term average production rate? (round to 3 decimals)<<
= 0.651+-5%

numericalresponse.label: If the processing rate (production rate while the machine is up) is \(\mu=2\) parts per minute, what is the long-term average production rate? (round to 3 decimals)
